name: Architects of Will
oracle_text:
When Architects of Will enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put them back in any order.
Cycling {U/B} ({U/B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: This secret society of mages manipulates the beliefs and opinions of others.

name: Arsenal Thresher
oracle_text: As Arsenal Thresher enters the battlefield, you may reveal any number of other artifact cards from your hand. Arsenal Thresher enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each card revealed this way.

name: Bant Sojourners
oracle_text:
When you cycle Bant Sojourners or it dies, you may create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
Cycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: "We must spread Bant's light before we are shadowed over."

name: Bant Sureblade
oracle_text: As long as you control another multicolored permanent, Bant Sureblade gets +1/+1 and has first strike.
flavor_text: Soldiers who fought through Grixis learned to hit first, recite the prayer of Asha later.

name: Brainbite
oracle_text:
Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: An Esper mage will leave a hole in your memory with surgical precision. A Grixis mage sees no reason to be so kind.

name: Breath of Malfegor
oracle_text: Breath of Malfegor deals 5 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: The blood of the demons quickened as their master rose over the battlefield. The blood of the angels also quickened: here was the chance to finally end the war started millennia ago.

name: Captured Sunlight
oracle_text:
Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)
You gain 4 life.

name: Cerodon Yearling
oracle_text: Vigilance, haste
flavor_text: The unit of measurement used to chart a cerodon's growth is "persons consumed."

name: Colossal Might
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Never corner a barbarian. You become the path of least resistance."
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Crystallization
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, exile that creature.

name: Deadshot Minotaur
oracle_text:
When Deadshot Minotaur enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target creature with flying.
Cycling {R/G} ({R/G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: "May the earth rise up to meet you."

name: Demonic Dread
oracle_text:
Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)
Target creature can't block this turn.

name: Deny Reality
oracle_text:
Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)
Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

name: Esper Sojourners
oracle_text:
When you cycle Esper Sojourners or it dies, you may tap or untap target permanent.
Cycling {2}{U} ({2}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: The wilder the frontier, the greater the need for a controlling hand.

name: Esper Stormblade
oracle_text: As long as you control another multicolored permanent, Esper Stormblade gets +1/+1 and has flying.
flavor_text: Stormcallers came to appreciate the novelty of Jund's volcanic updrafts.

name: Ethercaste Knight
oracle_text: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: "We coat ourselves in steel every day. What is etherium but the next logical step?"

name: Etherium Abomination
oracle_text: Unearth {1}{U}{B} ({1}{U}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: It was given life by the etherium of a hundred slain Esperites.

name: Ethersworn Shieldmage
oracle_text:
Flash
When Ethersworn Shieldmage enters the battlefield, prevent all damage that would be dealt to artifact creatures this turn.
flavor_text: "See, children of metal? Already your bodies are rejecting harm. Continue on our path, and perfection will be yours."

name: Fieldmist Borderpost
oracle_text:
You may pay {1} and return a basic land you control to its owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Fieldmist Borderpost enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

name: Firewild Borderpost
oracle_text:
You may pay {1} and return a basic land you control to its owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Firewild Borderpost enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

name: Glassdust Hulk
oracle_text:
Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Glassdust Hulk gets +1/+1 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.
Cycling {W/U} ({W/U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Godtracker of Jund
oracle_text: Whenever a creature with power 5 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Godtracker of Jund.
flavor_text: "The behemoths are content to graze like cattle, while dragons rage and conquer. I know which example I'll follow."

name: Gorger Wurm
oracle_text: Devour 1 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
flavor_text: In war-torn Alara, sometimes a wurm's gullet is the safest place to be.

name: Grixis Grimblade
oracle_text: As long as you control another multicolored permanent, Grixis Grimblade gets +1/+1 and has deathtouch. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy that creature.)

name: Grixis Sojourners
oracle_text:
When you cycle Grixis Sojourners or it dies, you may exile target card from a graveyard.
Cycling {2}{B} ({2}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Grizzled Leotau
flavor_text:
"There is no glory in a death of age, as even the leotau know. As winter steals into their coats, they seek the deadliest lands, that they may die as they lived."
—Aarsil the Blessed

name: Igneous Pouncer
oracle_text:
Haste

Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Islandcycling {2}, swampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island or Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

oracle_text: As long as you control another multicolored permanent, Jund Hackblade gets +1/+1 and has haste.
flavor_text: The knights were halfway through their precombat rites before they realized the foul brute meant to start without them.

name: Leonin Armorguard
oracle_text: When Leonin Armorguard enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Well suited are the nacatl to a coat of steel and forge-tempered claws.

name: Magefire Wings
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has flying.
flavor_text: Giving a thing wings does not take away its fear of flight—or its fear of fire, for that matter.

oracle_text:
You may pay {1} and return a basic land you control to its owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.

name: Monstrous Carabid
oracle_text:
Monstrous Carabid attacks each combat if able.
Cycling {B/R} ({B/R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: What happens when a plane of predators collides with four planes of prey?

name: Naya Hushblade
oracle_text: As long as you control another multicolored permanent, Naya Hushblade gets +1/+1 and has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

oracle_text:

Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Offering to Asha
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}. You gain 4 life.
flavor_text:
"His body belongs to Bant now. His soul? I honestly don't know. I expect it belongs to the angels."
—Rafiq of the Many

oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Forestcycling {2}, plainscycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest or Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Putrid Leech
oracle_text: Pay 2 life: Putrid Leech gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text: It reacted to Naya's overabundant food supply by growing additional mouths.

name: Qasali Pridemage
oracle_text:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{1}, Sacrifice Qasali Pridemage: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: An elder in one pride, of the Sigiled caste in another.

name: Rhox Brute
flavor_text:
"In this new world, I have seen the once-devout rhoxes take up arms with the savages of Jund. I would be offended, but I see the wisdom in their choice."
—Gernan, Dawnray archer

name: Sanctum Plowbeast
oracle_text:
Defender
Plainscycling {2}, islandcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains or Island card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Sangrite Backlash
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/-3.
flavor_text:
"Sangrite is the dragon's beating heart. Little wonder, then, that so many fools' chests burst trying to contain it."
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Sewn-Eye Drake
oracle_text: Flying, haste
flavor_text:
"Too wary to charge, too prudent to serve. Not anymore."
—Sedris, the Traitor King

name: Sigiled Behemoth
oracle_text: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text:
"Do not mistake a behemoth's assistance for subservience."
—Mayael the Anima

oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each creature you control.
Cycling {G/W} ({G/W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: As the elves learned the hymns of angels, the knights learned the roars of titans.

name: Singe-Mind Ogre

flavor_text: Even the balmgivers of Bant couldn't heal the incurables, but sharing their torment helped.

oracle_text:

flavor_text:
"Birth and death are both reversible."
—Nicol Bolas

name: Talon Trooper
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: "The volcanic winds make a maze of the skies of Jund. If we mean to invade, we must first learn their invisible paths."

name: Terminate
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"I've seen death before. My mother succumbing to illness, my comrades bleeding on the battlefield . . . But I'd never seen anything as dreadful as that."
—Taani, berserker of Etlan
